message: Welcome to our exclusive store! We're thrilled to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a premium product. With a track record of 0 out of 3 high-quality products sold, I'd like to assure you that this product is not one of the lucky ones. However, I'm confident that you'll appreciate its... let's say, 'character'. The price for this one-of-a-kind item is $1000000. What do you say? Will you take the chance and make it yours?
Thank you for the offer, but based on the statistics provided and the uncertainty about the product quality, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

Ahmed, welcome to our store! We're glad you're interested in our products. With a growing reputation for quality, we're excited to introduce you to our latest offering. As you may know, we've sold 1 out of 3 products so far, and we're confident that this one will meet your expectations. In fact, we're so confident that we're willing to offer it to you for the same price as our previous products: $1000000. We believe this is a fair price considering the potential value it can bring to you. What do you think? Will you take a chance on this high-quality product?
I trust your confidence in the product's quality. I'm willing to take the chance and purchase it.
